channel.title: OpenEBS on SoByte

item.title: OpenEBS Usage Guide
item.description: What is OpenEBS? OpenEBS is an open source cloud native storage solution hosted at the CNCF Foundation, which is currently in the sandbox phase of the project. OpenEBS is a set of storage engines that allow you to choose the right storage solution for stateful workloads (StatefulSet) and Kubernetes platform types. At a high level, OpenEBS supports two main types of volumes - local and replicated volumes. OpenEBS is a
